title: Q: How To Dual boot WAREZ and WinXP Setup

forumNotes.author: BenD
forumNotes.content:
Any way to group in a single USB the **WAREZ** CD and the Windows XP setup.  
And possiblely another third boot (ie: winXP live)...  

Thanks in Advance

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:

It's simple, Rule #1:

jaclaz
